bloodbath.title: The Lid Opens
bloodbath.description: As the tiny survivors stand on their crouton platforms, the refrigerator door swings open.

nonfatal.msg: {0} grabs a crumb and retreats behind the ketchup bottle.
{0} and {1} fight over a cheese shred. {0} gives up and retreats.
{0} and {1} fight over a cheese shred. {1} gives up and retreats.
{0} finds {weapon_any}.
{0} slides down a condensation droplet to safety.
{0} takes {weapon_any} from the butter compartment.
{0} rips {weapon_any} out of {1}'s hands.
{0} finds a puddle of {liquid_any}.
{0} hides inside an empty egg carton.
{0} gathers as much {food_any} as they can carry.
{0} finds a glob of {food_any}.
{0} clutches a thimble of {liquid_any} and runs away.
{0}, {1}, and {2} work together to raid the cheese drawer.
{0} runs away with a twist-tie and a rubber band.
{0} snatches a drop of hot sauce and a napkin scrap.
{0} finds some {food_bad} but takes it anyway.
{0} grabs an empty bottle cap, not realizing it's useless.
{0} breaks {1}'s nose for a crumb of {food_any}.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} share everything they gathered before scattering.
{0} receives {weapon_any} from inside a forgotten takeout container.
{0} grabs some {food_any} while {1} gets a paperclip.
{0} scares {1} away from the meat drawer.
{0} grabs a piece of aluminum foil as a shield.
{0} snatches {weapon_any}.
{0} discovers a secret passage behind the pickle jar.
{0} befriends a confused fruit fly.
{0} turns out to be {1}, covered in mustard as a disguise!
{0} finds {weapon_cold} and immediately feels more confident.
{0} grabs {weapon_chemical} from behind a jar of pickles.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} form a temporary alliance to secure the top shelf.
{0} dives into a produce bag and disappears from sight.
{0} squeezes under the door seal and finds a hidden stash.
{0} and {1} discover {weapon_explosive} at the same time. They agree to share... for now.

fatal.msg: {0} steps off their crouton platform too soon and falls into spilled milk.
{0} is crushed by a falling olive.
{0} accidentally steps into a glob of {liquid_bad}.
{0} cannot handle the cold and succumbs to hypothermia.
{0} is swept away by a sudden condensation flood.
{0} slips on grease and falls off the shelf.
{0} stabs {1} with a toothpick.
{0} finds {1} hiding in the vegetable crisper and eliminates them.
{0} finds {1} hiding in the vegetable crisper, but {1} strikes first.
{0} pushes {1} into the path of a rolling grape.
{0} drowns {1} in a puddle of pickle brine.
{0} tries to kill {1} with {weapon_projectile} but it ricochets off a jar.
{0} accidentally knocks over a bottle of hot sauce. {1}, {2}, and {3} are swept away in the flood.
{0} triggers an avalanche of frozen peas, killing themselves, {1}, and {2}.
{0} uses {weapon_explosive} without understanding the consequences. {1} and {2} are caught in the blast.
{0} hits {1} with {weapon_fire}. The screaming is brief.
A bottle of salad dressing rolls across the shelf, crushing {0} and {1}.
{0} shoves {1} into a cascade of falling condiment packets.
{0} panics and throws {weapon_chemical} wildly. It hits {1} directly.

day.title: Day {0}
day.description: The survivors forage through the cold shelves.

nonfatal.msg: {0} searches for supplies in the condiment door.
{0} and {1} form an alliance in the cheese drawer.
{0} hunts for other survivors among the leftovers.
{0} tends to their frostbite.
{0} and {1} share some {food_any}.
{0} sets up camp inside a hollowed-out bell pepper.
{0} explores the mysterious back of the fridge.
{0} and {1} work together to scale the mayonnaise jar.
{0} discovers a warm spot near the motor.
{0} crafts a sled from a butter wrapper.
{0} practices combat with {weapon_any}.
{0} takes a nap inside a bread bag.
{0} collects {liquid_any} from condensation.
{0} and {1} debate whether the thing in the back is still edible.
{0}, {1}, and {2} build a shelter from toothpicks.
{0} finds a forgotten fortune cookie and reads their fate.
{0} and {1} play cards using cracker pieces.
{0} writes their will on a napkin scrap.
{0} discovers an ancient expiration date and has an existential crisis.
{0} catches and tames a fruit fly for transportation.
{0} accidentally triggers the light. Everyone freezes.
{0} and {1} argue about which shelf is safest.
{0} mourns the loss of an ally by pouring out some {liquid_neutral}.
{0} investigates the door shelves and finds {weapon_any}.
{0} hears the ice maker rumble and wisely keeps their distance.
{0} crafts a grappling hook from a twist-tie and dental floss.
{0} and {1} establish rival territories on opposite shelves.
{0}, {1}, and {2} pool resources to build a rope ladder from produce netting.
{0} discovers a crack in the back panel that leads to warmth.
{0} and {1} trade information about safe routes through the fridge.
{0} fashions armor from a pistachio shell.

fatal.msg: {0} is killed by {1} with {weapon_any}.
{0} finds {1} and eliminates them with a well-aimed frozen pea.
{0} and {1} fight over territory. {0} wins.
{0} and {1} fight over territory. {1} wins.
{0}, {1}, and {2} track down and eliminate {3}.
{0} pushes {1} into {liquid_bad}.
{0} smothers {1} with a piece of cling wrap.
{0} ventures into the freezer section and never returns.
{0} is mistaken for a crumb and eaten by a curious human.
{0} falls into the meat drawer and drowns in mystery juice.
{0} gets trapped in a closing Tupperware lid.
{0} ambushes {1} from behind the mustard jar.
{0} slips on {hazard_slippery} while hunting {1}. {1} finishes them off.
{0} chases {1} into {hazard_cold}. Neither emerges.
{0} sets up an ambush in the egg carton but {1} saw them enter.
{0} hunts {1} through the condiment door. The hunt ends at the hot sauce.
{0}, {1}, and {2} corner {3} in the butter compartment. There is no escape.

night.title: Night {0}
night.description: The compressor hums as the survivors try to rest.

nonfatal.msg: {0} tries to sleep but the compressor is too loud.
{0} and {1} share body heat to survive the cold.
{0} stays awake all night, watching for threats.
{0} takes watch while {1} sleeps in an egg cup.
{0} and {1} discuss strategy for tomorrow.
{0} dreams of being full-sized again.
{0} has nightmares about expiration dates.
{0} and {1} whisper about their favorite foods they've seen.
{0} can't sleep because {1} snores too loudly.
{0} quietly sharpens {weapon_any}.
{0} hears something moving in the crisper drawer.
{0} counts frozen peas to fall asleep.
{0}, {1}, and {2} huddle together for warmth.
{0} writes in their journal by the glow of the fridge light.
{0} and {1} play rock-paper-scissors to decide watch shifts.
{0} regrets eating that {food_bad} earlier.
{0} wonders if their family will ever open the fridge.
{0} prays to the great refrigerator god for mercy.
{0} wakes in a panic when the fridge light flickers on, then off.
{0} hears the compressor cycle and mistakes it for approaching footsteps.
{0} secretly moves their camp while everyone sleeps.
{0} and {1} take turns keeping each other awake with scary stories.
{0} lies awake, convinced something is watching from the crisper drawer.
{0} sneaks out to gather supplies while the others rest.
{0}, {1}, and {2} form a night watch rotation.

fatal.msg: {0} is killed in their sleep by {1}.
{0} attempts to kill {1} in their sleep, but {1} wakes up and fights back.
{0} successfully eliminates {1} while they sleep.
{0} freezes to death overnight.
{0} is dragged away by something in the dark.
{0} rolls off the shelf in their sleep.
{0} and {1} kill each other in a midnight confrontation.
{0} wakes up to find {1} standing over them. It's the last thing they see.
{0} succumbs to hypothermia while on watch duty.
{0} uses {weapon_piercing} to eliminate {1} in the darkness.
{0} sleepwalks off the edge of the shelf.
{0} and {1} both freeze to death huddled together.
{0} sneaks up on {1} with {weapon_cutting}, but steps on a crumb. {1} reacts faster.

feast.title: Someone Left the Leftovers Out
feast.description: Fresh leftovers have been placed on the top shelf. The survivors converge.

nonfatal.msg: {0} grabs supplies from the warm leftovers.
{0} and {1} fight over a piece of pepperoni. {0} wins.
{0} and {1} fight over a piece of pepperoni. {1} wins.
{0} takes what they need and retreats.
{0} and {1} agree to split the pizza crust fairly.
{0} sneaks away with some garlic bread while everyone fights.
{0}, {1}, and {2} form a temporary truce to raid the container together.
{0} uses the chaos to steal {weapon_any} from {1}.
{0} gorges themselves on warm pasta.
{0} fills their pockets with breadcrumbs.
{0} and {1} get into a food fight with mashed potatoes.
{0} slips away unnoticed with the best scraps.
{0} raids the Chinese takeout container and emerges with a fortune.
{0} and {1} coordinate a pincer attack on the Thanksgiving leftovers.
{0} hoards an entire grain of rice and refuses to share.
{0}, {1}, and {2} barter scraps like seasoned merchants.
{0} discovers the mac and cheese is still warm and claims it as territory.

fatal.msg: {0} is killed at the feast by {1} using {weapon_any}.
{0} eliminates {1} at the feast with a chopstick through the heart.
{0}, {1}, and {2} ambush {3} at the feast.
{0} shoves {1} into the still-hot gravy.
{0} and {1} fight to the death over the last meatball. {0} wins.
{0} and {1} fight to the death over the last meatball. {1} wins.
{0} chokes on their feast loot while fleeing.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} descend into a free-for-all. Only {0} survives.
{0} is scalded by the still-steaming soup.
{0} is trampled in the stampede toward the fresh bread.
{0} and {1} agree to a truce. {0} immediately breaks it.
{0} betrays their alliance with {1} for a piece of pepperoni.
{0}, {1}, and {2} are crushed when the takeout container lid falls shut.

feast.title: Grocery Delivery
feast.description: Fresh groceries have arrived. New supplies rain down from above as bags are unpacked.

nonfatal.msg: {0} catches a falling grape and secures it as supplies.
{0} and {1} race to claim a fresh strawberry. {0} gets there first.
{0} and {1} race to claim a fresh strawberry. {1} gets there first.
{0} hides inside a new egg carton before it's placed in the fridge.
{0} discovers a fresh loaf of bread and claims a crumb empire.
{0}, {1}, and {2} work together to drag a blueberry to safety.
{0} finds {weapon_any} that fell from a grocery bag.
{0} takes shelter inside a new yogurt container.
{0} and {1} establish a base camp in the fresh produce section.
{0} stockpiles fresh {food_good} while others are distracted.
{0} rides a rolling orange to a new hiding spot.
{0} and {1} form an alliance over a shared cheese wheel discovery.
{0} claims an entire baby carrot as their territory.
{0}, {1}, and {2} divide up a fresh deli slice fairly.
{0} discovers the new milk jug provides excellent cover.

fatal.msg: {0} is crushed by a falling can of beans.
{0} is knocked off the shelf by incoming groceries.
{0} pushes {1} into the path of a rolling apple.
{0} and {1} fight over a fresh grape. Only {0} survives.
{0} and {1} fight over a fresh grape. Only {1} survives.
{0} is buried under an avalanche of new produce.
{0}, {1}, and {2} are swept away when a milk carton tips over.
{0} kills {1} with {weapon_any} while everyone is distracted by the new food.
{0} is trapped and suffocates in a sealed bag of spinach.
{0} throws {1} into the chaos of falling groceries.
{0} mistakes {liquid_bad} for {liquid_good} in the confusion.

feast.title: Midnight Snack Raid
feast.description: A human hand reaches in, searching for a midnight snack. Chaos erupts as the fridge is disturbed.

nonfatal.msg: {0} hides behind the ketchup as the hand passes by.
{0} and {1} dive for cover when the light turns on.
{0} freezes perfectly still and avoids detection.
{0} uses the distraction to relocate to a better position.
{0} and {1} cling to each other as containers shift around them.
{0} rides a jar being moved to a safer shelf.
{0}, {1}, and {2} huddle in the back corner until it's over.
{0} grabs supplies that fell during the disturbance.
{0} discovers a new hiding spot revealed by the reorganization.
{0} and {1} form a pact to warn each other of future raids.
{0} plays dead among the crumbs. The human doesn't notice.
{0} steals {weapon_any} while everyone else panics.
{0} and {1} find themselves on the same shelf after the chaos.
{0} emerges from the chaos with a handful of {food_good}.
{0}, {1}, and {2} survive by hiding in the vegetable crisper.

fatal.msg: {0} is grabbed by the human hand, mistaken for a crumb.
{0} is crushed when a container is carelessly replaced.
{0} falls from a disturbed shelf to their death.
{0} pushes {1} into the human's line of sight.
{0} uses the darkness to eliminate {1} unnoticed.
{0} and {1} are both knocked off the shelf by a swinging door.
{0} is swept out of the fridge when the human grabs the wrong container.
{0}, {1}, and {2} are discovered and removed from the fridge.
{0} kills {1} with {weapon_any} while the human blocks the light.
{0} panics and runs into a puddle of {liquid_bad}.
{0} throws {1} at the human as a distraction. It doesn't end well for {1}.

feast.title: Holiday Leftovers Bonanza
feast.description: The fridge overflows with holiday feast remnants. A cornucopia of chaos awaits.

nonfatal.msg: {0} discovers an entire slice of pie and guards it jealously.
{0} and {1} share a piece of holiday ham in an unlikely truce.
{0} builds a fort from mashed potato containers.
{0} finds {weapon_any} stuck in the cranberry sauce.
{0} and {1} establish territory in the turkey leftovers.
{0}, {1}, and {2} feast together on stuffing crumbs.
{0} rolls around in the gravy boat, coating themselves for warmth.
{0} claims the entire dinner roll as their home.
{0} and {1} navigate through towers of Tupperware containers.
{0} stockpiles enough {food_good} to last for days.
{0} hides inside a carved pumpkin decoration.
{0} and {1} form an alliance based on shared love of sweet potato casserole.
{0}, {1}, and {2} barter holiday scraps like black market traders.
{0} discovers a cache of {food_good} behind the eggnog.
{0} makes armor from a candy cane wrapper.

fatal.msg: {0} drowns in a sea of gravy.
{0} is buried under an avalanche of leftovers.
{0} pushes {1} into the cranberry sauce. They never resurface.
{0} and {1} fight to the death over the last piece of pie. {0} wins.
{0} and {1} fight to the death over the last piece of pie. {1} wins.
{0} chokes on a piece of fruitcake.
{0}, {1}, and {2} are crushed by a falling ham bone.
{0} eliminates {1} with {weapon_any} during the holiday chaos.
{0} is scalded by hot mulled cider that was just added.
{0} slips on a candy cane and falls to their doom.
{0} betrays {1} for the last gingerbread crumb.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} get trapped in the cookie tin. Only {0} escapes.

arena.title: The Great Defrost
arena.description: The freezer section begins to thaw. Massive ice shelves crack and collapse.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the defrost.
{0} surfs a wave of meltwater to safety.
{0} and {1} cling to a floating ice cube together.
{0} finds shelter under a frozen pizza box.

fatal.msg: {0} is crushed by a collapsing ice shelf.
{0} drowns in the flood of meltwater.
{0} is impaled by a falling icicle.
{0} knocks {1} into the freezing water.
{0} pushes {1} under a collapsing ice wall.
{0} and {1} are both swept away by the flood.

arena.title: The Condiment Avalanche
arena.description: The ketchup bottle tips over. A red tide approaches.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the condiment flood.
{0} climbs to higher ground just in time.
{0} and {1} help each other escape the ketchup tsunami.
{0} uses a bread crust as a raft.

fatal.msg: {0} is swept away by the ketchup flood.
{0} drowns in condiments. A tragic end.
{0} is buried under an avalanche of relish.
{0} pushes {1} into the ketchup current.
{0}, {1}, and {2} are all consumed by the condiment catastrophe.

arena.title: Mold Outbreak
arena.description: The mystery container in the back has been opened. Spores fill the air.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the mold outbreak.
{0} holds their breath and escapes the spore cloud.
{0} and {1} share a piece of napkin as a makeshift mask.
{0} was already immune due to eating {food_bad} earlier.

fatal.msg: {0} inhales the spores and collapses.
{0} succumbs to the toxic mold.
{0} pushes {1} into the spore cloud.
{0} locks {1} in the moldy container.
{0} and {1} both refuse to retreat and die together in the mold.

arena.title: The Hand
arena.description: A massive human hand reaches into the fridge, searching for something.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the giant hand.
{0} hides behind a jar as the hand passes by.
{0} and {1} dive for cover just in time.
{0} freezes perfectly still and goes unnoticed.
{0} prays to be overlooked and is spared.

fatal.msg: {0} is grabbed by the hand and removed from the fridge.
{0} is mistaken for a piece of food and eaten.
{0} is crushed when the hand knocks over a jar.
{0} pushes {1} into the hand's path.
{0} uses {1} as a decoy while they escape.

arena.title: Mystery Tupperware Opens
arena.description: The ancient container in the back has finally been opened. Something unspeakable emerges.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the Tupperware horror.
{0} runs away before getting a good look at it.
{0} and {1} seal themselves in a jar until it passes.
{0} pretends to be dead and the thing ignores them.

fatal.msg: {0} looks directly at the contents and dies of shock.
{0} is consumed by whatever was in the Tupperware.
{0} throws {1} at the horror as a distraction.
{0} and {1} are both absorbed by the ancient leftovers.
{0}, {1}, and {2} attempt to fight it. They all fail.

arena.title: Power Outage
arena.description: The power goes out. Temperature rises. The ice begins to weep.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the power outage.
{0} finds a warm spot and enjoys the temporary comfort.
{0} and {1} form an emergency alliance as chaos spreads.
{0} relocates to higher ground before the meltwater arrives.
{0} discovers the temperature change has softened some {food_any}.

fatal.msg: {0} suffocates in a sealed container as the air grows stale.
{0} is trampled in the panic when the lights go out.
{0} drowns in meltwater pooling on the bottom shelf.
{0} pushes {1} into a rising pool of condensation.
{0} and {1} fight over the last cool spot. Neither wins.
{0} seals {1} in a container as the temperature rises.

arena.title: The Great Cleaning
arena.description: A human is reorganizing the fridge. Containers shift. Shelves move. Nothing is safe.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the great cleaning.
{0} hides successfully as containers are shuffled around them.
{0} rides a jar to a new location and finds better supplies.
{0} and {1} cling to each other as their shelf is moved.

{0} pushes {1} into the path of a moving jar.

arena.description: Resources run low. The survivors must venture into the forbidden freezer section.

nonfatal.msg: {0} survives the freezer expedition.
{0} finds frozen treasures buried in the ice.
{0} and {1} huddle together for warmth in the frozen wasteland.
{0} discovers ice caves carved into the frozen vegetables.
{0} makes it back to the fridge section just in time.
{0}, {1}, and {2} form an expedition party and return with supplies.

nonfatal.msg: {0} grabs {weapon_any}.

{0} makes a weapon from a twist-tie and a tack.
{0} sets a trap using {food_any} as bait.
{0} and {1} share stories about life before the shrinking.
{0} attempts to read an expiration date and has a breakdown.

{0} and {1} arm wrestle. {1} wins.
{0} trips over a breadcrumb but plays it cool.
{0} finds a working pen cap and uses it as a helmet.
{0} remembers what life was like before they were tiny.
